configuration.title: AMXXPawn Configuration
configuration.language.reparseInterval.d: The shortest allowed interval between two syntax re-parses of the same file
configuration.language.webApiLinks.descr: Should #include statements that contain filenames from the AMXX package link to the Web API Reference
configuration.compiler.includePaths.desc: An array of strings containing include paths for the compiler
configuration.compiler.options.descripti: An array of additional options that should be passed to the compiler
Shows additional information like command arguments and exit code when compiling
configuration.compiler.reformatOutput.de: Should amxxpc output be reformatted to make it more readable
configuration.compiler.outputType.descri:
Where should .amxx files be output. Can be:
 - 'source' (same as input)
 - 'path' (specified in amxxpawn.compiler.outputPath setting)
configuration.compiler.outputPath.descri: If amxxpawn.compiler.outputType is set to 'path', then use this path to output .amxx files
command.compile.title: Compile Plugin
command.compileLocal.title: Compile Plugin Local
